rule.name: Parent Keys Exist
rule.description: Records must exist that have references in other tables

rule.name: Tables must exist for all Constraints
rule.description: Foreign and Local tables must exist AND must be tables (could be a view). Fixing violations will require modifying missing_FK_query.sql

rule.name: Field Mapping Issue
rule.description: Field Mapping Issue - Foreign key owner does not exist

rule.name: Incompatible Column Type
rule.description: Column Types are incompatible

rule.name: Unhandled Constraint Mapping
rule.description: Unhandled constraint mapping issue

rule.name: Table Missing
rule.description: Table definitions must exist in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Table Comment
rule.description: Table comment must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Column Data Type
rule.description: Column data type must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Primary Key Flag
rule.description: Column primary key state be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same COLUMN_NULLABLE
rule.description: Column nullable state must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Column Data Type Size
rule.description: Column Data Type Size must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Column Description
rule.description: Column Description must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Column Default Value
rule.description: Column Default Value must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Column Missing
rule.description: Column definitions must exist in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Unique Constraint Columns
rule.description: Unique Constraint Columns must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Unique Constraint Missing
rule.description: Unique Constraint must exist in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Index Columns
rule.description: Index Columns must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Index Unique
rule.description: Index Unique state must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Index Missing
rule.description: Index must exist in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: View Missing
rule.description: View must exist in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Index Unique
rule.description: Index Unique state must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Sequence Missing
rule.description: Sequence must exist in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Start Value
rule.description: Start Value must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Foreign Key Missing
rule.description: Foreign Key must exist in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Foreign Table
rule.description: Foreign Table must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Local Columns
rule.description: Local Columns must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Foreign Columns
rule.description: Foreign Columns must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same On Delete Clause
rule.description: On Delete Clause must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same On Update Clause
rule.description: On Update Clause must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas

rule.name: Same Local Table
rule.description: Local Table must be the same in both KS and DDL schemas
